frontmatter.title: How to quickly get set up to stream in Reactive
frontmatter.metaTitle: How to use a phone to live stream with Reactive
frontmatter.metaDesc: How to easily use a phone to live stream with the Reactive shopify app

pageProps.content:
Reactive makes it easy to get set up to stream quickly:

### 1. Install Live streaming software

For the purposes of this article we will be using [OBS Studio](https://obsproject.com/). OBS studio is a free, open source and safe to download live streaming software for Mac, Windows or Linux computers. That said, these steps are easily transferrable to most live streaming solutions.
![Install OBS](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-set-up-a-stream/install-obs.png)

### 2. Configure OBS for Reactive

1. Once installed, open OBS on your desktop.
2. Open _"Settings"_ from the bottom right.![Open settings](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-set-up-a-stream/open-settings.png)
3. Select _"Stream"_ from the settings menu.![Select stream](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-set-up-a-stream/select-stream.png)
4. [Open Reactive from Shopify Admin](/support/get-started-in-shopify/) and paste the provided Reactive _"Stream Key"_ and _"Server URL"_ into the _"Stream"_ settings in OBS. Then click _"OK"_ to save the settings.![Paste settings](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-set-up-a-stream/paste-settings.png)

### 3. Add a video source

1. Click the "+" button in the _Sources_ panel.![Click add source](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-set-up-a-stream/click-add.png)
2. Select _"Video Capture Device"_.![Select video source](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-set-up-a-stream/select-source.png)
3. Select _"Create New"_(if not already selected) and optionally give your video capture device a name, then click _"OK"_.![Name device](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-set-up-a-stream/name-device.png)
4. Open the _"Device"_ dropdown menu and select your built-in web camera or the connected device of your choice, then click _"OK"_.![Select device](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-set-up-a-stream/select-device.png)

### 4. Start streaming

1. In OBS click _"Start Streaming"_ and you should see your stream appear in the Reactive app.![Start streaming](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-set-up-a-stream/start-streaming.png)
2. When you are ready to stream to all visitors on your site click the _"Go live"_ button and it is show time!![Go live button](/blog-assets/go-live-button.png)
